fj.test

Class Rand

  • java.lang.Object
    • fj.test.Rand

  • public final class Rand
extends java.lang.Object
    A random number generator.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Rand standard
      A standard random generator that uses Random.
